Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
Enemy
public class Enemy extends Object
Used in the Game class to create Enemy objects to attack the player

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(String name, String description, int health, int damage, int evaderate, int evademult)
      Initialize all fields based on the constructor
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the enemy
      description - A description of the enemy
      health - The health of the enemy
      damage - The amount of damage the enemy deals

  • Method Details

    • addLoot

      public void addLoot(Item item)
      Adds an item to the enemy's drop table, all of which are given to the player upon it's death
      Parameters:
      item - The name of the item to add to the drop table

    • effectDecay

      public void effectDecay()
      Sets the active effect of the enemy
      Parameters:
      String - the name of the effect

    • listLoot

      public ArrayList<Item> listLoot()
      Returns:
      ArrayList A copy of the enemy's drop table

      public String getEffect()
      Returns:
      String the effect the enemy has

    • getEvade

      public int getEvade()
      Returns:
      the evasion rate of the enemy

    • getEvadeMult

      public int getEvadeMult()
      Returns:
      the evasion multiplier of the enemy

    • attacked

      public void attacked(Item item, int adr)
      Called by the player, deals damage to the enemy based on the value of the getDamage() method of the item the player is currently holding
      Parameters:
      item - The item the enemy was attacked with, otherwise, the item the player is currently holding
      int - The player's current adrenaline level, modifies the amount of damage dealt to the enemy
